name: Cast India
description: trader & supplier of Commercial Food Pro
overview:
Our firm Cast India was incorporated in the year 1990 as a partnership entity at Salkia, Howrah, West Bengal (India). Today the firm is a prominent name to reckon amongst clients. We are manufacturer, exporter, trader & supplier of Commercial Food Processing Machines, Aluminium Castings, C.I. Castings, Cooling Tower Gear Boxes, Mild Steel Fabrication, Base Plates, Plummer Blocks, Mechanical Hammers, Industrial Pulleys, Industrial Gears and Industrial Machinery.

Our Infrastructure: Large area of land and sheds with modern infrastructure are possessed where the firm has installed very sophisticated machinery and equipments. High precision tools enable workmen to skilfully perform the activity of manufacturing, assembling, welding & jointing, painting and finishing the products.

Quality: Keeping all the quality parameters as our major focus, we manufacture and supply an extensive range of quality products. Our products are highly demanded in market because of there robust structure, high quality and reasonable price. Each valve is designed and manufactured to conform to recognized standards of the valve industry.

Our Team: A team of dedicated and extremely talented professionals have been employed for taking up activities of manufacture, assembling, finishing and other activities under their vigilant surveillance. The skilled personnel are a competent lot to undertake all the assignments entrusted to them.

Vendor Base: In our endeavour to offer quality products to our clients we have built alliances only with authentic vendors. We make very sure that our vendors provide us only the quality ingredients and processing techniques while developing our product range.

Why Us?: All the products manufactured and supplied by find the client’s satisfaction owing the quality, workmanship, finish and neat packing. The appreciation of clients is also because of the vast range of quality products made available to them at time schedules.

offices.address1: 2, Mirpara Lane, Salkia, Near Salkia Chourasta, Howrah
